homeTwoHero.title: Hi, I am Aurag Gupta
homeTwoHero.text:
I am a frontend web developer. I can provide clean code and pixel perfect design.
I also make website more & more interactive with web animations.

homeThreeHero.title: Hi, I am Aurag Gupta
homeThreeHero.text:
I am a Full Stack Developer and Technology Architect with expertise in building scalable web applications.
I specialize in Next.js, MERN Stack, and AWS, creating secure, high-performance solutions.
I love transforming ideas into impactful digital experiences.

homeFourHero.title: Hi, I am Aurag Gupta
homeFourHero.text:
I am a frontend web developer. I can provide clean code and pixel perfect design.
I also make website more & more interactive with web animations.

aboutData.title: Anurag Gupta
aboutData.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
aboutData.text: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with experience in building scalable web applications using Next.js, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I enjoy designing and developing clean, user-friendly interfaces and robust backend systems. My focus is on creating efficient, secure, and high-performing applications that deliver real value.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.text: Building modern, responsive, and interactive UIs using Next.js, React.js, and Tailwind CSS with a focus on performance and user experience.

services.title: Backend Development
services.text: Designing and implementing secure, scalable APIs and server-side logic using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for efficient data management.

services.title: Full Stack Applications
services.text: End-to-end web application development combining frontend, backend, and databases to deliver complete, production-ready solutions.

services.title: Deployment & DevOps
services.text: Containerization and deployment with Docker, AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, SES, SQS) and CI/CD pipelines for smooth and automated releases.

services.title: Database Design
services.text: Structuring optimized and scalable databases with MongoDB and MySQL, ensuring data integrity, efficiency, and performance.

services.title: WordPress & PHP Solutions
services.text: Custom websites, blogs, and CMS development with WordPress and PHP, tailored to client requirements with SEO optimization.

skillData.title: My Technical Skills
skillData.text: I have hands-on experience in full-stack web development, mobile app development, cloud deployment, and backend system design. My skill set allows me to build scalable, secure, and user-friendly applications from scratch, integrating both frontend and backend seamlessly.

portfolioItems.title: The Smart Fellowship
portfolioItems.subTitle: Immersive offline workplace simulation—train your mind to master human-first skills like jugaad, emotional intelligence & first-principles thinking.

portfolioItems.title: MCANSEY IT Services & Consulting Pvt Ltd
portfolioItems.subTitle: Corporate IT-services portal crafted with modern Next.js, Tailwind, TypeScript & Embla—sleek responsive UI with seamless email integration.

portfolioItems.title: Samanya Gyan
portfolioItems.subTitle: Intuitive government exam prep portal—Next.js frontend, MERN backend; quizzes, tests & secure API flows with crisp, responsive UX.

portfolioItems.title: Varcas Batteries
portfolioItems.subTitle: Product-rich showcase for battery tech—Next.js + MERN stack delivers dynamic specs, pricing, and intuitive user navigation.

portfolioItems.title: 24x7 Service Centers
portfolioItems.subTitle: Comprehensive home appliance repair platform—Next.js, Firebase & Express power seamless user-service interactions and backend workflows.

portfolioItems.title: Hub Enterprises
portfolioItems.subTitle: Elegant interior-design showcase with graceful UI—built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap & PHP for a polished browsing experience.

portfolioItems.title: Jai Mata Di Interior
portfolioItems.subTitle: Interior contractor website—crafted using HTML, PHP & MySQL; SEO-optimized for visibility; easy navigation for showcases and inquiries.

portfolioItems.title: AJ Productions
portfolioItems.subTitle: WordPress event-management site—featuring service portfolios, testimonials, contact forms & galleries; SEO-tuned for engagement.

portfolioItems.title: Digital Infotech
portfolioItems.subTitle: Local repair-service presence—WordPress site built for Mumbai’s mobile & computer service center; responsive, SEO-enhanced, client-centric.

informations.text: Working with this team was a fantastic experience. They delivered our project on time with great attention to detail.

informations.title: Ananya Verma
informations.text: The website design was clean, professional, and user-friendly. It helped us connect better with our audience.

informations.title: Arjun Mehta
informations.text: They understood our requirements perfectly and implemented solutions that improved our business efficiency.

informations.title: Priya Iyer
informations.text: The support and communication throughout the project were excellent. Highly recommended for any digital solutions.

informations.title: Siddharth Nair
informations.text: Their technical expertise and creativity brought our vision to life. The platform runs smoothly and looks amazing.

informations.title: Neha Gupta
informations.text: Very professional and reliable team. The final output exceeded our expectations in terms of design and performance.

experience.title: Technology Architect
experience.subTitle: Workverse, Mumbai (Khar Road)
experience.text: Designed and developed the complete backend system for a Simulation Game platform using Express.js and MongoDB. Built an admin dashboard with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for organizations to manage learners and licenses. Implemented Firebase authentication and verified tokens for Google and Apple devices. Deployed and scaled systems using AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, SES, SQS, Route 53, CloudWatch, IAM).

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.subTitle: MCANSEY IT Services & Consulting Pvt Ltd, Mira Bhayandar
experience.text: Contributed to multinational and Indian projects using Next.js, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Developed platforms including NewzCover (real-time news), The Flique (tech reviews), Varcas Batteries (battery technology showcase), and 24x7 Service Centers (appliance repair). Implemented CI/CD pipelines, version control strategies, and deployments on VPS and AWS.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.subTitle: Intouch Digital Marketing Institute Pvt Ltd, Malad, Mumbai
experience.text: Developed and maintained websites using React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and PHP. Built client projects including a spa booking system and modified institute websites with scholarship pages and backend enhancements. Collaborated in a service-based company environment ensuring timely project delivery.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.subTitle: A H Satija & Co, Goregaon, Mumbai
experience.text: Worked on a restaurant application using TypeScript, React.js, Redux, and Node.js. Built frontend and backend features to improve user experience and performance. Gained strong MERN stack expertise and collaborated on scalable software solutions for the restaurant industry.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.subTitle: APML (Agarwal Packers & Movers), Goregaon, Mumbai
experience.text: Developed a dynamic React.js table for data visualization and created a dashboard to track logistics operations. Used MongoDB for efficient activity tracking, improving data management and reporting.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.subTitle: Thakur College of Science & Commerce, Mumbai University
education.text: Graduated with strong academic performance (CGPA 8.69). Gained core knowledge in programming, data structures, web technologies, and full-stack development.

education.title: Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) - Science
education.subTitle: Valia College, Mumbai
education.text: Completed HSC with specialization in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, along with Computer Science.

education.title: Secondary School Certificate (SSC)
education.subTitle: Smt. R.M.V. School, Mumbai
education.text: Completed SSC with distinction, building a strong foundation in academics and an early interest in computer science.

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Visit my social profiles and get connected
contactData.text: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, project inquiries, or just to connect. I’m always open to discussing new opportunities, creative ideas, and ways to bring value through technology.
